remixlab.dandelion.constraint

Class Hinge

  • java.lang.Object
    • remixlab.dandelion.constraint.Constraint
      • remixlab.dandelion.constraint.Hinge

  • public class Hinge
extends Constraint
    A Frame is constrained to disable translation and allow 1-DOF rotation limiting Rotation by defining an Axis (according to Local Frame Coordinates) a Rest Rotation and upper and lower bounds with values between 0 and PI

      • constrainRotation

        public Rotation constrainRotation(Rotation rotation,
                                  Frame frame)
        Description copied from class: Constraint
        Filters the rotation applied to the frame. This default implementation is empty (no filtering).

        Overload this method in your own Constraint class to define a new rotation constraint. See Constraint.constrainTranslation(Vec, Frame) for details.

        Use Frame.inverseTransformOf(Vec) on the rotation Quat.axis() to express rotation in the world coordinate system if needed.

        Overrides:
        constrainRotation in class Constraint

      • constrainTranslation

        public Vec constrainTranslation(Vec translation,
                                Frame frame)
        Description copied from class: Constraint
        Filters the translation applied to the Frame. This default implementation is empty (no filtering).

        Overload this method in your own Constraint class to define a new translation constraint. frame is the Frame to which is applied the translation. You should refrain from directly changing its value in the constraint. Use its Frame.position() and update the translation accordingly instead.

        translation is expressed in the local Frame coordinate system. Use Frame.inverseTransformOf(Vec) to express it in the world coordinate system if needed.

        Overrides:
        constrainTranslation in class Constraint
